question: Egg is deficient in -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i.e., Vitamin C o Egg contains all nutrients except carbohydrate and Vitamin 'C\o Food items as Poor Sources of nutrients :# Milk is a poor source of Vitamin C and Iron.# Milk is a poor source of Calcium.# Milk is a poor source of Carbohydrates.o Food items as Rich Sources of nutrients :# Halibut Liver Oil is richest source of Vitamin A and Vitamin D.# Indian Gooseberry (amla) is richest source of Vitamin C.# Gingelly seeds are richest source of Vitamin Bj (Thiamine).# Sheep liver is richest source of Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin).

question: What is the biological value of egg protein:
exp: Ans. (c) 100Ref : K. Park 23rd ed. / 630Biological value is a measure of the proportion of absorbed protein from a food which becomes incorporated into the proteins of the organisms body.Biological value of Proteins in several food products* Whole egg: 100* Cow milk: 91* Beef: 80* Casein: 77* Soy: 74* Wheat gluten: 64
